## Community.playTransactions() method

playTransactions is a convenience wrapper on community to make calling the underlying Tupelo.playTransactions easier when using a fully community client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
playTransactions(tree: ChainTree, transactions: Transaction[]): Promise<import("tupelo-messages/signatures/signatures_pb").CurrentState>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tree | <code>ChainTree</code> |  |
|  transactions | <code>Transaction[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<import("tupelo-messages/signatures/signatures_pb").CurrentState>`
